description:
Chopper fights bravely to stop Shura from incinerating the Going Merry, but the little reindeer is no match for a sky priest. Gan Fall is on his way, but will the dispossessed deity arrive in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chopper Ayaushi! Motokami Tai Shinkan Shura
Chopper en danger ! L`ancien dieu face au prélat Shura
Chopper in Danger! Former God vs. Priest Shura!
Чоппер в опасности! Бывший бог против жреца Суры
تشوبّر في خطر! الإله السّابق ضدّ الكاهن شورا!
ช็อปเปอร์มีภัย! อดีตจอมเทพ V.S. เทพสาวกชูร่า
チョッパー危うし! 元神VS神官シュラ
